testcase.name: Sort items by status
testcase.system-out: Given go to odoo, log in and go to purcases.................................passed Given User is on incoming products module...................................passed When User clicks on Status tab..............................................passed Then All results should be sorted by availability...........................passed

testcase.name: All status values should be displayed
testcase.system-out: Given go to odoo, log in and go to purcases.................................passed Given User is on incoming products module...................................passed Then Every item should have avilability status..............................passed

testcase.name: Create a new Vendor Bill
testcase.system-out: Given go to odoo, log in and go to purcases.................................passed Given User is on odoo Purchases/Vendor Bills module.........................passed When User clicks on Create button...........................................passed And User fills out the form to create a new vendor bill.....................passed And User clicks on Add an item button.......................................passed And User enters "ice cream" into item name field and clicks Enter...........passed When User clicks on Save button.............................................passed Then "ice cream" appears in the created bill................................passed

testcase.name: search by right PO number
testcase.system-out: Given go to odoo, log in and go to purcases.................................passed When user enters a "PO" number..............................................passed Then User should see receipt by "PO" number.................................passed

testcase.name: search by wrong PO number
testcase.system-out: Given go to odoo, log in and go to purcases.................................passed When user enters a word "<string>" into a search box........................passed Then User should see message that could not found receipt...................passed

testcase.name: Check kanban List
testcase.system-out: Given go to odoo, log in and go to purcases.................................passed Given User goes to kanban to assert it's list...............................passed Then user goes to List to assert it's list.................................passed

testcase.name: SearchingVendorCompany in Purchase module
testcase.system-out: Given go to odoo, log in and go to purcases.................................passed When User goes to Vendor module.............................................passed And User creates a company leaving name empty and saves it..................passed And User should see message "The following fields are invalid:".............passed Then User should see the message dissapeared................................passed

testcase.name: Creating new vendor profile
testcase.system-out: Given go to odoo, log in and go to purcases.................................passed Given User is in vendors module.............................................passed When User clicks on Create Vendor button....................................passed And User fills out the neede information....................................passed And Creates a note for profile..............................................passed And User clicks on Save button..............................................passed Then Message account is created should appear...............................passed

testcase.classname: Creating new vendor account under Vendors functionality.
testcase.name: Create a new vendor account
testcase.system-out: Given go to odoo, log in and go to purcases.................................passed Given User is on Odoo Purchases/Vendor Bills module.........................passed When User clicks create button..............................................passed And User types name.........................................................passed When User clicks create button on the buttom of the page....................passed And User fills out form to create a new vendors account.....................passed And User clicks Save&Close button...........................................passed Then New contact info appears on the screen.................................passed

testcase.name: search products by name
testcase.system-out: Given go to odoo, log in and go to purcases.................................passed Given user is on odoo purchases/products module.............................passed When user enters a word "apple" into a search box...........................passed Then system should display results that contain the word "apple"............passed And a small tab with the word "apple" appears in the search box.............passed

testcase.name: display/hide advanced search option
testcase.system-out: Given go to odoo, log in and go to purcases.................................passed Given user clicks on the search icon........................................passed Then advanced search options should display.................................passed When user clicks on the search icon again...................................passed Then advanced search options should disappear...............................passed
